page.title: 15SADBERGE PEOPLES JOBS
page.content: I have done a survey of peoples jobs in Sadberge.I know that a few years ago most people lived and worked in the village mainly as farm workers.Now because we have better transport people can travel a lot further to their work.I asked all the children in the school what their parents jobs were,these are the results.There were forty sets of parents in the survey.I found that the most common job was an {office worker (9) then farmers (5) the rest of the results were{lorry drivers {(4) school teachers (3) garage workers {(3) electricians (3) shop workers (2) {bankers (2) public house workers (2) {one only jobs were:_agricultural {suppliers,dentist,nurse,architect, {civil engineer,policeman,builder,gas {worker,computer programmer,taxi driver {and a kennel worker. { By Alex Burgess Aged. (9)
